question: If you are _____ cold, have a hot drink to warm you up.
There _____ empty seats left in the hall.
The trip to Paris will _____ an ideal opportunity to practice my French.
If you're agreeable to our proposal, we'll _____ ahead.
We must deal with _____ before it gets out of hand.

The trip has been _____ to include a few other events.
How long have you _____ unemployed?
Her father has been missing _____ five years.
Do you _____ anyone to help out in the shop?
People in Italy _____ living under strict lockdown conditions for three months.
A lot of people _____ complained about the noise.
I want to hear your explanation for _____ late.
Make sure your hands are clean before you _____ your dinner.
He _____ completed his project by next Saturday.
I _____ across this book in a secondhand bookstore last month.
He's about the same age _____ you are.
Before you go to visit him, you _____ make sure he's at home.
She feeds her dog the same thing _____ she eats.
When Mary reached the bus stop, the last bus _____ already left.
I was just _____ into the bath when the phone rang.
Singapore ______ all social gatherings as part of its latest restrictions to help combat Covid-19.
She was _____ for threatening to spread coronavirus.
Schools around the world have been closed _____ the coronavirus pandemic.
Researchers discovered that people _____ eat more ultra-processed foods have a higher risk of cancer.
The retail industry has been decimated _____ the coronavirus pandemic.
John _____ the problem which parents don't know.
John throws a big party at his house _____ his parents are on vacation.
My parents had already _____ by the time I got home.
This insect is tiny, _____ very dangerous.
